help.description: Returns a list of commands, you are able to use or informations about a specific command!

error.unknown: This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.

options.command: The command you need help with

signup.description: Posts a Signup message into a specific channel

error.missing_arguments: There are arguments missing, see `$0help signup` for more information
error.voiceDescription: The channel needs to be a Text channel!
error.eventDesc:
The Event `$0` at `$1` already exists.
To delete the event, please execute `$2deletesignup "$0" $1`
error.formatDesc:
Your Date and/or Time are in the wrong format.
Make sure you follow DD.MM.YYYY HH:MM

options.channel: The channel the Event will be posted in
options.event_date: The date of the Event (Format DD.MM.YYYY)
options.event_time: The time of the Event (in CEST/CET depending on the date)
options.event_desc: The description shown in the Event Signup message

deletesignup.description: Deletes an Event registered with the `$0signup` command

error.sql_desc: Something went wrong. I could not find the event or couldn't delete it.
error.args_desc: There are Arguments missing. See `$0help deletesignup`.
error.formatDesc:
Your Date and/or Time are in the wrong format.
Make sure you follow DD.MM.YYYY HH:MM

unavailable.description: Retrieves unavailable users from an Event registered with the `$0signup` command

error.sql_desc: Something went wrong. I could not find the event.
error.args_desc: There are Arguments missing. See `$0help unavailable`.
error.formatDesc:
Your Date and/or Time are in the wrong format.
Make sure you follow DD.MM.YYYY HH:MM

signup.already_signed_up_desc: You already signed up for this War.

confirmation.title: Player found
confirmation.desc:
We have found the following Informations about your Character.
Please confirm these Informations and we will sign you up for the upcoming war.
confirmation.name: Ingame Name

success.title: Successfully signed up
success.desc: We successfully signed you up for the upcoming war!

signup.edit_description: Please react with the given emoji to select which information you want to edit

edit.level_num_desc: Please enter your current Level **as a number**
edit.gearscore_desc: Please enter your current Gear Score
edit.gearscore_num_desc: Please enter your current Gear Score **as a number**

error.name_timeout_desc: You took too long to enter your name. Please click on `Edit` again.
error.level_timeout_desc: You took too long to enter your level. Please click on `Edit` again.
error.gearscore_timeout_desc: You took too long to enter your gear score. Please click on `Edit` again.

error.reactTime_desc: You took too long to select an emoji. Please click on `Edit` again.
error.name_timeout_desc: You took too long to enter your name. Please sign up again!
error.level_timeout_desc: You took too long to enter your level. Please sign up again!
error.gearscore_timeout_desc: You took too long to enter your gear score. Please sign up again!
error.dmChannel: <@$0> Seems like I am not allowed to send you a message. Make sure you allow users from this server to send you messages in the `Server Privacy Settings`

signout.confirmation_desc: We have successfully signed you out from the upcoming war!
signout.error_desc: There was an error while signing you out.

error.unknown: This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.
error.generic_error: There was an Error executing the command `$0$1`.
error.general_format:
Your command is not well formated:
`$0<Command> [args] [--<option> [option-arg]]`
error.args_format:
Your arguments are not well formated.
*Hint: Arguments with spaces must be surrounded by one " and cannot contain any additional "*
error.params_format:
Your options are not well formated.
*Hint: Options must start with '--' and __can__ contain one additional argument.*

labels.usage: React with the shown number to execute that command!
